title: Did Giuliani tweet that sex with barnyard animals was spreading COVID-19?
subtitle: President Trump's attorney, Rudy Giuliani, was positively examined at Coved 19 in December 2020.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: U.S. President Donald Trump's lawyer tweeted Rudy Giuliani, saying, "It's possible that all these people who infected the Chinese virus got it from having sex with barn animals."
